description.narrative:
The Project (IXcellerate) is an early stage equity investment in a holding company named IXcellerate Ltd. (the Company) established in the United Kingdom with the purpose of developing a 6,200m2 greenfield data center (DC) in Moscow through a 100% owned operating company named OOO IXcellerate (the Operating Company or IXcellerate Moscow) established in the Russian Federation.
The facility will be designed and constructed on par with the leading North American and European DC co-location facilities and the current design has been reviewed and approved by Ove Arup and Partners, which is a leading consulting firm in this field. This will be one of the first independent high quality pure-play DC co-location service providers in the Moscow market.

The Project is expected to have the following impacts: i) Expanding availability of IT infrastructure, services and solutions: IXcellerate fills a gap in the market for high quality/high availability systems hosting which is, in turn, needed for business continuity and disaster recovery service offerings. ii) The Company's association with Guy Willner, who co-founded one of largest global providers of vendor neutral data centers, brings best practice in operational procedures, design, and business model to the country. iii) Improved private sector connectivity and public sector competitiveness: This Project will help provide cost-efficient and energy-efficient IT infrastructure and services.

mailing-address.narrative:
Further information can be obtained from IXcellerate by contacting:
Name: Jerusha Kimani Title: Business Administration Manager IDCG Address: Fulham Palace, London SW6 6EA Telephone: +44-207-117-6300 Email: jerusha.kimani@idc-g.com

name.narrative: The DC will be constructed in an existing warehouse building, which was built 6 years ago. The building is located in the Dmitrovskoe/Altufievskoe shosse area, which is located in an industrial zone in Northern Moscow. As a relatively new warehouse it is an ideal location for data center services and a lease agreement has been signed with the landlord on October 31, 2011. In the first phase, approximately 1500m2 of raised white flooring with perimeter white walling will be constructed within this existing structure and therefore the amount of construction works that are expected to be required are very limited.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: BA - Internet Access Providers (Including ISPs, Datacenters)
